title: Dragons Don't Dance Ballet
description: Esmeralda Dragon works the spotlight at the City Ballet, but what she really wants to do is dance. Encouraged by her friend Harold to audition, Esmeralda takes a leap of faith only to discover that she doesn't quite fit in with the other ballerinas. But Esmerelda isn't ready to give up--and neither is Harold! A whimsical picture book that challenges body image expectations.
author: Jennifer Carson
